hero.subtitle: Learn how to use LearnShortcuts.dev step by step. Master the efficient way to learn and search for shortcuts.

step1.title: Select Category
step1.description: Choose the appropriate category from OS, Office, Google, Browser, Adobe, Others
details: Select main category from header menu
Others: Slack, Discord and other software

step2.title: Select Subcategory
step2.description: Choose subcategory from sidebar to view specific software shortcuts
details: Switch platforms using Windows/Mac tabs in each subcategory

step3.title: Shortcut Detail Page
step3.description: Click shortcut cards to learn on detail pages
details: Check key positions with interactive keyboard
Learn visually how to press keys with animations

Watch animations to see how to press keys

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: LearnShortcuts.dev prioritizes the protection of user personal information.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: LearnShortcuts.dev (hereinafter "Service") values user personal information and safely protects and manages personal information in accordance with personal information protection laws and related regulations. This Privacy Policy explains how personal information is collected, used, and protected when using the Service.

collection.title: Information We Collect
items: Information automatically collected during service use (IP address, browser information, access time)
Information directly entered by users (search terms, favorite settings)
Information collected through cookies and similar technologies

protection.title: Information Protection
items: Personal information is encrypted and stored securely
Only authorized personnel can access personal information
Users are notified immediately in case of personal information leakage

rights.title: User Rights
items: Request to view, correct, and delete personal information
Request to stop processing personal information
Request notification of personal information processing status
Request for compensation under personal information protection law

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve service functionality and enhance user experience.
types: Essential cookies: Provide basic service functions
Performance cookies: Collect service usage statistics

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.content: This Privacy Policy may be revised in accordance with changes in related laws or service policies. Important changes will be notified in advance through service announcements.
